title: Two dead in shooting at Monroe Civic Center
content:
MONROE, La. (KNOE 8 News) - Monroe Police are investigating a shooting which killed two people early Sunday morning at the Monroe Civic Center.
Police say the shooting happened in the north parking lot of the civic center after a closed event. They say multiple victims were hit by bullets, two of which have died as a result of their injuries. Police say this was a result of an ongoing feud, and the two people dead were acquaintances.
This is a developing story. We will update you as the investigation continues.
